CBP Command Line¶

Run CBP Instruments.

usage: cbp.py [-h] [-v]
              {phidget,pententiometer,altaz,birger,lamp,shutter,photodiode,filter
              wheel,monochrometer,keithley,spectograph,laser} ...

Named Arguments¶

-v, --verbose Default: False

Sub-commands:¶

phidget¶

prints out phidget position

cbp.py phidget [-h]

pententiometer¶

prints out information about the two pententiometers

cbp.py pententiometer [-h]

altaz¶

instrument to move camera

cbp.py altaz [-h] {compile,steps,angle} ...

Sub-commands:¶

compile¶

Does the compile action

cbp.py altaz compile [-h]
steps¶

Does the steps action

cbp.py altaz steps [-h] steps motornum
Positional Arguments¶
steps Default: 1000
motornum Default: 1
angle¶

Does the angle action

cbp.py altaz angle [-h] motornum angle
Positional Arguments¶
motornum Default: 1
angle Default: 2.0

birger¶

birger instrument

cbp.py birger [-h] {focus,aperture} ...

Sub-commands:¶

focus¶

sets the focus

cbp.py birger focus [-h] focus
Positional Arguments¶
focus

the value to set the focus to.

Default: 4096
aperture¶

sets the aperture

cbp.py birger aperture [-h] aperture
Positional Arguments¶
aperture

the value to set the aperture to.

Default: 0

lamp¶

sets the lamp

cbp.py lamp [-h] lamp

Positional Arguments¶

lamp Default: 100

shutter¶

sets the shutter

cbp.py shutter [-h] shutter

Positional Arguments¶

shutter Default: -1

photodiode¶

prints photo

cbp.py photodiode [-h]

filter wheel¶

filter wheel instrument

cbp.py filter wheel [-h] {position,get position} ...

Sub-commands:¶

position¶

change position of filter wheel.

cbp.py filter wheel position [-h] mask filter
Positional Arguments¶
mask Default: 0
filter Default: 0
get position¶

get position of filter wheel.

cbp.py filter wheel get position [-h]

monochrometer¶

monochrometer instrument

cbp.py monochrometer [-h] {wavelength,get wavelength,filter,get filter} ...

Sub-commands:¶

wavelength¶

change the wavelength of the monochrometer

cbp.py monochrometer wavelength [-h] wavelength
Positional Arguments¶
wavelength Default: 600
get wavelength¶

get the wavelength of the monochrometer

cbp.py monochrometer get wavelength [-h]
filter¶

change the filter of the monochrometer

cbp.py monochrometer filter [-h] monofilter
Positional Arguments¶
monofilter Default: 1
get filter¶

get the filter of the monochrometer

cbp.py monochrometer get filter [-h]

keithley¶

keithley instrument

cbp.py keithley [-h]

spectograph¶

spectograph instrument

cbp.py spectograph [-h] duration

Positional Arguments¶

duration Default: 1000000

laser¶

laser instrument

cbp.py laser [-h]
             {change_wavelength,change_wavelength_loop,check wavelength} ...

Sub-commands:¶

change_wavelength¶

change wavelength

cbp.py laser change_wavelength [-h] wavelength
Positional Arguments¶
wavelength Default: 500
change_wavelength_loop¶

loop through array of wavelengths

cbp.py laser change_wavelength_loop [-h] [--diagnostic]
                                    wavelength_min wavelength_max
Positional Arguments¶
wavelength_min Default: 500
wavelength_max Default: 520
Named Arguments¶
--diagnostic

performs diagnostic

Default: False
check wavelength¶

check wavelength

cbp.py laser check wavelength [-h]
